attributes.description:
THIS CAR IS PRISTINE CONDITION AND IS THE ONLY WHITE COLOR IN THE COUNRTY, STILL REMAINS AN IMPORTANT THEME IN THE FERRARI PRODUCTION AND THE FACT WAS CONFIRMED ONCE MORE AT THE 2002 GENEVA MOTOR SHOW WITH THE PRESENTATION OF THE 575M MARANELLO, A SUBSTANTIAL RIVISION OF THE 550 IN BOTH STYLING AND MECHANICS. THE FRONT HAS A DIFFERENT STYLE, WITH A SMALL GRILL AND AIRTAKES AND A MODIFIED SHAPE FOR THE LOWER SPOILER. A MORE REFINED DESIGN OF 5 SPOKE ALLOY RIMS WAS ALSO ADOPTED.
THE INTERIOR WAS COMPLETELY REDESIGNED WITH THE PRINCIPAL INSTRUMENTS IN A SINGLE DIAL INFRONT OF THE DRIVER, THE SEATS HAVE 6 DIFFERENT, ELECTRICALLY REGULATED POSITIONS TO PROVIDE MAXIMUM DRIVING COMFORT, THE DOOR PANEL FINISH AND ONBOARD COMPONENTS WERE ALSO DESIGNED AND MORE.CALL US TODAY TO MAKE THIS ICONIC CAR YOURS. TRADE INS WELCOME.
attributes.options: ABS, Aircon, Electric Windows, Leather seats, Air bags, Full service record, Radio
attributes.title: 2004 Ferrari 575 m Maranello

attributes.description:
THIS STUNNING CAR APPREARED AT THE 1999 GENEVA MOTOR SHOW IN THE FORM OF THE 360 MODENA. THE ADVANCED AERODYNAMICS WITH ITS WEIGHT PARED TO THE BONE. THE SOFT AND COMPACT SURFACES OF THE MODENA CONTINUED ALONG THE BONNET OVER THE WINDSCREEN.
ALONG THE FLANKS IN WHICH THERE ARE PAIRS OF AIR INTAKES. THE POWER OF THE V8  WAS UPPED TO 3,586 cc TO RETURN 400 hp at 8,500rpm. ON THIS MODEL TOO, THE SIX SPEED GEARBOX WAS ALSO MADE AVAILABLE WITH A SEQUENTIAL CONTROL LEVER BEHIND THE STEERING WHEEL. AND MORE INTRIGUING CREATURE COMFORT TAKE ADVANTAGE OF THIS GREAT DEAL CALL US TODAY. FINANCE AVAILABLE, TRADE INS WELCOME,OPTIONS FOR EXTENDED WARRANTY.

attributes.title: 2012 Hyundai i20 1.4 Glide

attributes.description:
TEN YEARS AFTER THE INTRODUCTION OF THE 308 GTB AT THE 1975 PARIS MOTOR SHOW, THE CARS MECHANICS WERE REFRESHED BY THE INSTALLATION OF A NEW ENGINE THAT IS STILL A 900 V8. THIS SPORTS SALOON WAS ACCREDITED WITH 270hp -30hp MORE THAN THE QUATROVALVE AND TOP SPEED OF OVER 263KM/H.
THE FRONT END OF THE CAR WAS GIVEN A NEW RADIATOR GRILL WITH OPTICAL GROUPS RECESSED INTO IT. THE BUMPERS WERE COLOUR-KEYED WITH THE BODY, THE NEW 5 -SPOKE ALLOY RIMS. THE AIR INTAKE AND THE GRILL ON THE BONNET WERE SET WITH THEIR CLEANER, MORE ATTRACTIVE DESIGN. 
AS ALWAYS, THE INTERIOR OF THE CAR WAS WELL FINISHED AND ACCESSORISED WITH LEATHER UPHOLSTERY FOR SEATS AND DOOR PANELS. CALL US TODAY TO TAKE ADVANTAGE OF THIS ICONIC CAR. MAKE IT YOURS. TRADE INS WELCOME.

attributes.title: 1989 Ferrari 328 GTS

attributes.description:
THIS 3.8L, FLAT-SIX CYLINDER, TWIN TURBO, SEVEN DUAL SPEED DUAL CLUTCH TRANSMISSION HAS ALWAYS BEEN THE FASTEST, MOST LUXURIOUS 911 AVAILABLE.  ITS FUEL CONSUMPTION IS AS LOW AS 8.1L/100KM. TOP SPEED IS 315KM/H
BOASTING A FULL FRANCHISE SERVICE HISTORY THIS STUNNING CAR EXHIBITS GREAT CREATURE FEATURES:
-TILT &SLIDE SUNROOF
- PADDLE SHIFT STEERING WHEEL
-PARKING DISTANCE CONTROL FRONT AND REAR.
-NAVIGATION, BLUETOOTH, AUX CONNECTIVITY.
- ADAPTIVE SPORT SEATS
-ACTIVE SUSPENSION WITH CERAMIC BRAKES.
-YELLOW BRAKE CALIPERS.
-CRUISE CONTROL.
-CD/DVD CHANGER AND MORE. CALL US TODAY TO TAKE ADVANTAGE OF THIS GREAT DEAL.FINANCE AVAILABLE.TRADE INS WELCOME.OPTIONS FOR EXTENDED WARRANTY.

attributes.description:
THE 488 SPIDER WAS PRESENTED FOR THE FIRST TIME AT FRANKFURT IN 2015.
THE ADOPTION FOR THE FIRST TIME ON A CONVERTIBLE FERRARI OF THE INOVATION RHT(RETRACTABLE HARD TOP), THE ELECTRONICALLY GOVERNED FOLDING ROOF DIVIDING INTO TWO PARTS BEHIND THE COCKPIT.
AMONG THE OTHER KEY FEATURES OF THE 488 SPIDER PROJECT ARE THE SPACEFRAME CHASSIS, FABRICATED WITH NO LESS THAN 11 DIFFERENT ALUMINIUM ALLOY, COMBINED WITH OTHER MAGNESIUM, THAT GAURANTEES FLEXIONAL AND TORSIONAL RIGIDITY VALUES ON A PAR WITH THOSE OF THE COUPE, TO THE BENEFIT OF ROAD HANDLING. PARTICULAR ATTENTION WAS ALSO PAID TO THE AERODYNAMICS, AS REVEALED BY CERTAIN BODYWORK DETAILS SUCH AS THE EYE-CATCHING SCULPTURAL CREASES ALONG THE BONNET, THE COMPLEX SYSTEM OF "THREE DIMENSIONAL" AIR INTAKES, THE REAR SCREEN ADJUSTABLE IN THREE POSITIONS, CLIMATATE CONTROL, NAVIGATION, BLUETOOHTH CONNECTIVITY,
YELLOW SAFETY BELTS AND BRAKE CALIPERS AND MORE. CALL US TO MAKE THIS STUNNING CAR YOURS TODAY.FINANCE AVAILABLE.TRADE INS WELCOME.
